scripts.do-publish: yarn prepublish && yarn workspace react-query-swagger publish --tag next
scripts.prepublish: yarn update-nswag && yarn copy_from_v4_to_v3 && yarn copy_to_no_hooks && yarn copy_from_v4_to_vue && yarn copy_to_minimal && yarn copy_to_minimal_no_hooks && yarn generate-all && yarn typecheck
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace react-query-swagger tsc && yarn workspace pet-client-v3 tsc && yarn workspace pet-client tsc && yarn workspace pet-client-vue type-check
scripts.generate-all: yarn generate-api-client-axios && yarn generate-api-client-axios-minimal && yarn generate-api-client-axios-minimal-no-hooks && yarn generate-api-client-axios-v3 && yarn generate-api-client-fetch && yarn generate-api-client-fetch-v3 && yarn generate-api-client-no-hooks && yarn generate-api-client-no-hooks-axios && yarn generate-api-client-no-hooks-no-modules && yarn generate-api-client-axios-vue && yarn typecheck
scripts.copy_from_v4_to_vue: yarn copyfiles -u 2 -e "src/templates/File.liquid" -e "src/templates/AxiosClient.liquid" -e "src/templates/FetchClient.liquid" -e "src/templates/ReactQuery.MetaFile*.liquid" -e "src/templates/ReactQuery.Imports.liquid" src/templates/**/* src/templates_vue && node scripts/patch-vue-templates.mjs
